put.summary:
Finish the 3DS payment.
Reuse the order references and the paymentRequestId (returned from the POST).

parameters.description: The card payment put request.

parameters.description: All data needed to make a 3DS card payment

parameters.description: Gets or sets the authentication token.

post.summary:
Achieve a payment with a card without 3DSecure.
To achieve a 3DS payment (CheckEnrollment), see the /payment/card3ds-payment resource.

parameters.name: cardPaymentRequest
parameters.description: All data needed to make card payment

parameters.name: authToken
parameters.description: Gets or sets the authentication token.

post.summary: Achieve a payment by copy of a previously processed payment, with the same payment method.

post.summary: Achieve a batch of payments by copy of previously processed payments, with the same payment method.

get.summary:
Get the token provided by the Security Token Service (STS).
The authentication token is mandatory for the others api calls.
It's expire after 48h by default.
get.description: See the following lines for example :     GET /v1/auth/token     {        "authorization": "Y2Rpc2NvdW50OmNkaXNjb3VudDEyMzQv"     }

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: The credentials (login:password in base64)
